project_descr: The objective of the project is to protect and empower the people who have been most severely affected by climate-change induced drought in 13 communities in three of the most vulnerable agro-ecological zones of Lesotho.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to protect and empower the people who have been most severely affected by climate-change induced drought in 13 communities in three of the most vulnerable agro-ecological zones of Lesotho.
